reviewText: Kids love the movie. Great life lessons.
Great family fun! The kids are easy to wake up when I tell them they can begin their day watching an Adventures in Odyssey movie!

Well worth the money spent--kids love this movie and all Odyssey movies.  Creative, fun, and teachable.  Real and involving.  Check them all out, you will not be disappointed and especially your children will not be disappointed!
My 3 year old love adventures in odyssey!
Always good
Love it! Great show that teaches about moral and God.
Our kids love these movies! Very wholesome! A.I.O. teach morals and character. Honestly this series is priceless.  Sometimes can get a little thematic for children under 6 or so.
Excellent!!
The children sit mesmerize watching each of these stories.  I recommend it to use for children ages 3 to 10.
love it and so did the family!
Our boys enjoy and we appreciate the values the shows teaches them!
Love AIO on prime!
Great adaptation of the radio drama. Still prefer the radio drama, but well done.
These are great G rated cartoons.
Great shows for kids.
great for kids
Exciting story, Family friendly.
I love the values it teaches my children and they enjoy watching them!
Great Family show!
Awesome.
We love adventures in odyssey! From my 3 year old to my 12 year old and all in between!
Excellent

My children love Adventures in Odyssey (ages 2-9). All if the episodes are clean, sharing Christian values, funny and entertaining. This episode was not different. Both my husband and I enjoyed watching this with the children.
